banner_title: Modified by you, made by Fender
banner_desc: Create a factory-customized guitar, as unique as you are.
step1_desc: Select your model and choose all specifications.
step2_desc: Review specifications and place an order. You will receive a confirmation email.
step3_desc: Your instrument is manufactured in our Corona, California plant and goes through Fender's inspection process.
step4_desc: We build and ship your order within 30 days.
carousel: Choose one of our available models.
